CustomField.formula:
IF (ISPICKVAL( Type , "Frame Agreement"), IF( Frame_Agreement_Amount_Estimate__c > 0, Frame_Agreement_Amount_Estimate__c , IF(TEXT(Frame_Agreement_Context__c)='New', Amount / MAX(Number_of_Suppliers__c, 1) * 0.4, Amount / MAX(Number_of_Suppliers__c, 1))),
0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates value of the Frame agreement based on your input. Please refer to user documentation for details.
CustomField.label: Frame Agreement Amount - Calculation
